import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod){ navigate('/payment'); } const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); //5.123 => "5.12" => 5.12 cart.itemPrice = toPrice( cart.cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0) ); cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemPrice > 100 ? toPrice(0) : toPrice(10); cart.taxPrice = toPrice(0.15 * cart.itemPrice); cart.totalPrice = cart.itemPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice; const placeOrderHandler = () => { }; return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map(item => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • )) }

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    ${cart.itemPrice.toFixed(2)}
  • Shipping
    ${cart.shippingPrice.toFixed(2)}
  • Tax
    ${cart.taxPrice.toFixed(2)}
  • Order Total
    ${cart.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
) }
